price: Hasha! Hakika maandiko ya wakosefu bila ya shaka yamo katika Sijjin.
arabic: كَلَّآ إِنَّ كِتَٰبَ ٱلۡفُجَّارِ لَفِي سِجِّينٖ
footnotes: Wacheni kupunja, na kughafilika na kufufuliwa! Kwani hakika waliyo andikiwa wakosefu katika a'mali zao mbovu, bila ya shaka yamo katika Sijjin.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: kallā inna kitāba al-fujāri lafī sijjīnin
